response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an investment piece that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its unique features and the quality it offers, we believe its value lies well beyond $12,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a product that will not only serve you well but also appreciate in value over time.
